Room.Name: Paladin Testing Arena
Room.ShortDescription: You must defeat the White Knight to advance to the next level.
Room.LongDescription: The White Knight stands with his sword across his chest, awaiting your move. All paladins who aspire to serve the Lyanden Kingodm must be tested for bravery and purity of heart. So that you may know you are worthy, the White Knight, who is one level above you, has volunteered to provide you with a trial. When you are ready you may strike the first blow.
